text: Very good place to be at! Patient staff and dive packages are pretty affordable for what you pay for

Unbelievable! reaching out their hands to help us out in term of advise, briefing & equipment. No doubt we did not take any course from them. Next leisure dive gotta try them out, with their hospitality, attitude & passion in them. I'm sure faiths have brought me around to know there're kind & greater people exist.

Went to the snorkeling on june 2021.. The trip is fantistic and everything is well organised. The instructors and coaches are extremely helpful and friendly.. Most impt, the BBQ lunch is yummy..  It is highly recommended... Keep it up

Paid $600+ to go to the Tioman trip last year. They said I failed my mask clearing and didn't bring the trip forward to this year. I told them I wanted to go through another lesson to pass this year. No response and no refund at all. Bad customer service.
Great advice and fair prices. Also with flower shop and coffe shop which makes excellent clay pot coffee! ☕️
